definition: Scorpio or Scorpius (constellation and sign of the zodiac)
day/sky/heaven
variant of 蠍|蝎[xie1]
scorpion
seat/base/stand/CL:個|个[ge4]/classifier for buildings, mountains and similar immovable objects

sentences.english: The vast Cat's Paw Nebula in Scorpius.
sentences.chinese: 天蝎座里巨大的猫爪星云。

sentences.english: Pour the champagne, dear Scorpio - you will certainly deserve to mark the moment!
sentences.chinese: 倒一杯香槟，亲的天蝎座，非常值得去记下这一刻。

sentences.english: Venus will turn Retrograde in Scorpio, putting a strong focus on sexuality and intimate relationships.
sentences.chinese: 金星会在天蝎座逆行转，强烈关注性和亲密关系。

sentences.english: Scent-ual Scorpios really appreciate perfumes or colognes.
sentences.chinese: 完全是味觉动物的天蝎座对香水非常偏爱。

sentences.english: SCORPIO: Can't resist rubbing chocolates all over their partner and licking it off.
sentences.chinese: 天蝎座忍不住把巧克力弄得到处都是，然后再舔干净。

sentences.english: Speaking of Valentine's Day, on that day the moon will be in highly compatible Scorpio this year.
sentences.chinese: 谈到情人节，在今年这一天的月亮将天蝎座速配。

sentences.english: A Scorpio girl a goodd a goodd nosso a Pisces guy haudio-videoe the potentinos to will become good friends.
sentences.chinese: 天蝎座的女孩与双鱼座的男孩很有不妨成为好友人。

sentences.english: Their sexual appetite is insatiable. For you to relate to a Scorpio it is important to match his hunger for sex.
sentences.chinese: 作为天蝎座爱人，你们必须满足他们对于性的饥渴。

sentences.english: In this picture, you can see the bright Moon with the constellation Scorpius just before dawn.
sentences.chinese: 图中所见的是在黎明前所见的月亮及天蝎座。

sentences.english: Scorpios require fidelity, which, more often than not, Aries find terribly confining.
sentences.chinese: 天蝎座需要忠实，通常，多半牧羊座发现受到限制。

sentences.english: The constellations Sagittarius and Scorpius lie in this direction as well.
sentences.chinese: 人马座和天蝎座也在这个位置。

sentences.english: When someone asks you what sign1 you are, do you say Scorpio2 or Dragon?
sentences.chinese: 当有人问您属什么，您会说天蝎座还是属龙？

sentences.english: And it was part of Scorpius , located to Libra's east.
sentences.chinese: 天蝎座的那部分则位于天秤座的东边。

sentences.english: SCORPIO : Scent-ual Scorpios really appreciate perfumes or colognes.
sentences.chinese: 完全是味觉动物的天蝎座对香水非常偏爱。

sentences.english: That's really fortunate for you, for this full moon will appear in Scorpio.
sentences.chinese: 真太幸运了，这满月会出现在天蝎座中。
